name: BROADBAND iTV, INC., petitioner, v. HAWAIIAN TELCOM, INC., et al.
name_abbreviation: Broadband iTV, Inc. v. Hawaiian Telcom, Inc.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
BROADBAND iTV, INC., petitioner,
v.
HAWAIIAN TELCOM, INC., et al.
attorneys: Motion of U.S. Inventor, Inc., et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Motion of AliphCom, dba Jawbone for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit denied.
casebody.head_matter:
BROADBAND iTV, INC., petitioner,
v.
HAWAIIAN TELCOM, INC., et al.
No. 16-1241.
Supreme Court of the United States
May 22, 2017.
Motion of U.S. Inventor, Inc., et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Motion of AliphCom, dba Jawbone for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit denied.
